plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is likely to be animation or action. Their favourite plot could be either a classic story or a more modern one. Their favourite musical score could be either orchestral or electronic. Their favourite mood for the musical score could be either happy or sad. Their favourite setting could be either a fictional world or a real-world one. Their favourite visual style could be either hand-drawn or computer-generated. Their favourite writing style could be either humorous or serious. Their favourite runtime could be either short or long. Their favourite themes could be either family-friendly or more mature.
